title: PaMAGIC
image-alt: screen shot of the website www.pamagic.org
teaser: I led a team in rebuilding the organization's website on the Drupal CMS platform.  Later, I led switching to the Wild Apricot platform.  I continue to serve on the Technology Committee.

title: McKinney Party of 5
image-alt: screen shot of the website www.mckinneypartyof5.life
teaser: I designed and developed a family blogging site using a Jamstack approach.  The website was built using Jekyll, delivered through CloudFlare, and utilizes the Bootstrap framework.
